if you think about new technologies like

conversion
are we seeing the right movements in the

insights need to be processed very close
to where the data sets it's I'll give
you an example if you're standing in the

seconds matter in the customer
experience the future the grocery
industry belongs to those organizations
that can process data at the edge of

to keep our data as close to the source
